docs.text: weather-api-demo Setup Install git clone https://github.com/JohnCalhoun/weather-api-demo.git cd weather-api-demo make init cp config.yml.example config.yml Configure create open weather account and get an API Key https://openweathermap.org/guide open config.yml and replace put_your_key_here with your api key Example ./example.py Tests make tests
docs.title: Home
